def_cn: （尤指运动员）动作迅速的，快速的
def_en: You use pacy to describe someone, especially a sports player, who has the ability to move very quickly.

def_cn: （故事或电影）节奏快的，一环紧似一环的
def_en: If you describe a story or a film as pacy, you mean that it is exciting because the events happen very quickly one after another.
